pr_title: Query and Set Default SSL configuration

timeline.message:
Add CipherPrefSetDefault, CipherPrefGetDefault

Signed-off-by: Alexander Scheel <ascheel@redhat.com>

timeline.bodyText: If we want to mimic Java Enum style, we probably can add a value() that returns _enum.
timeline.author: edewata

replies.bodyText: Yeah, a future improvement would be to make these actual enums, but for the time being, I think we'll leave it as-is.
replies.author: cipherboy

timeline.message:
